title: Robinson Crusoe (Gibba)
creator_credit: Gibba, IFE International and Corona Cinematografica
brief_description: Daniel Defoe’s famous adventure story is brought to life by the distinct style of the Italian animator, Gibba. Screen adaptation and script by Alan Thornton, Albert Chimenz, Frank Driver and Antony Victor. Dialogue by Alan Thornton.
